actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the repatriation of the remains of five unknown members of the United States Navy killed and interred in Tripoli in 1804 and for the interment of such remains in Arlington National Cemetery.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Navy to provide for the repatriation of the remains of five unknown members of the United States Navy killed and interred in Tripoli in 1804 and for their interment in Arlington National Cemetery. Directs the Secretary of State to provide such assistance as the Secretary of the Navy may require.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the repatriation of the remains of five unknown members of the United States Navy killed and interred in Tripoli in 1804 and for the interment of such remains in Arlington National Cemetery.
